definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: The plant has been designed to treat incoming waste of a wide cross-section of physical properties and packaging.
sentences.chinese: 根据设计，工厂可以处理不同属性和包装的废料。

sentences.english: Biomass may also include biodegradable wastes that can be burnt as fuel.
sentences.chinese: 生物量还包括能够当作燃料燃烧的可降解废料。

sentences.english: It is the world 's largest nuclear waste facility.
sentences.chinese: 这是世界上最大的核废料处理场所。

sentences.english: Also, industrial scrap that is trimmed by stampers and auctioned to buyers.
sentences.chinese: 同样，工业废料由压模产生，再销售给买主。

sentences.english: Anti-nuclear demonstrators stand in front of a water cannon during a protest outside a nuclear waste storage facility in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 德国核废料存储工厂外举行抗议行游的反核主义者们。

sentences.english: When wet waste is dewatered, it leaves behind a dry biosolid.
sentences.chinese: 当湿废物脱水后，残留下了干生物废料。

sentences.english: Industrial waste is despoiling the environment.
sentences.chinese: 工业废料正在使环境失色。

sentences.english: Mr. Daley says the waste created by sugar refineries is also valuable.
sentences.chinese: 达利先生认为制糖厂生产的废料也是大有价值的。

sentences.english: The storage pools for radioactive spent fuel at Fukushima have also posed a threat.
sentences.chinese: 福岛核电站的核废料池也同样存在威胁。

sentences.english: However, plans are under consideration for above-ground storage of spent fuel from reactors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，人们正在计划将来自核反应的废料在地面储藏。

sentences.english: Use the auto-conveyor belt to collect the punching waste for easily to tide up.
sentences.chinese: 冲孔废料，以自动输送袋输送收集，方便整理。

sentences.english: Waste from Canada’s agricultural sector can provide for biomass-derived fuels.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大的农业废料可用作生物质燃料。

sentences.english: Do you make sure that your waste suppliers are authorized by the convenient administration?
sentences.chinese: 你确保您的废料供应商授权的方便管理？

sentences.english: It’s completely exposed to the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 核废料池将会完全暴露于大气中。

sentences.english: Denial is the default position when it comes to nuclear waste.
sentences.chinese: 牵涉到核废料时，拒绝面对是默认立场。

sentences.english: Quality control of color picture tubes may require the salvage and reuse of the glass envelopes .
sentences.chinese: 彩色显像管的质量控制需要利用和回用玻璃泡废料。

definition: remnants of material from an industrial process/offcut/scraps
mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
trash/refuse/garbage/(coll.) of poor quality/Taiwan pr. [le4 se4]
